title: Buying RP on a North America Account QUESTION(EuNe)
body:
It is strange, for some reason someone is deleting all of my posts related about hextech crafting, if you buy RP on a NA server, why riot does that? Why they delete all of my post, lol.
 
In other manner I had a big request, does anybody knows if I buy Riot Points into a paysafe card code in my current country Romania, Can i use that paysafe code in my smurf account in NA ?
